strategy_capsules: Lower alpha to localize, boost structural neighborhood signals to overcome distractor noise
Aggressive localization via lower alpha + stronger temporal coupling to overcome distractor noise
structural_insights: Distractor files appear to be synthetic noise in curated repo - high connectivity but semantically irrelevant
Expected files are in crates/ subdirectory structure - need stronger neighborhood expansion
Seed files are tests - need better test→implementation coupling detection
Lower alpha will concentrate rank around seed's immediate graph neighborhood
Distractor files appear synthetic with high connectivity but no semantic relevance
Test↔impl coupling is the critical signal being drowned out
crates/ subdirectory structure suggests legitimate files are deeper - depth penalties may need recalibration later
100-file curated repo means each parameter change has high leverage

proposal.mode_justification: No trajectory data is provided; exploring fresh guidance on collapse handling and oscillation control can surface better inner behavior.

edits.content: If NDCG oscillates (>3% swings) for 3+ episodes, dampen magnitude changes and prioritize stabilizing interactions before new pushes.
edits.rationale: Adds a stability guard to reduce oscillation-induced regressions.

edits.content: On collapse signals, first unwind the most aggressive boosts, then explore an orthogonal direction rather than reversing everything.
edits.rationale: Gives a structured recovery path after sharp drops.

edits.content: When failures cite missing query context, rebalance temporal vs structural signals; when overwhelming signal shows, trim boosts and elevate alpha slightly to globalize.
edits.rationale: Maps common failure themes to concrete parameter tendencies.

edits.content: Treat coupling discoveries as first-class: propose paired tweaks with shared rationale to avoid conflicting single-parameter moves.
edits.rationale: Encourages coordinated changes that respect interactions.

edits.content: Analytical and hypothesis-first. Lead with collapse/oscillation check, cite concrete failures, and tie each proposed change to a rationale.
edits.rationale: Pushes for explicit hypotheses and rationale-linked adjustments.

expected_effects: Lower risk of oscillatory regressions through stabilization guardrails
Better mapping from failure themes to parameter adjustments
Clearer, hypothesis-driven proposals tied to rationale
proposal.hypothesis: Adding stability and collapse protocols plus interaction-aware heuristics will reduce oscillations and improve recovery, lifting average NDCG.
